sourcesContent:
import { ErrorMessage, Field, Formik } from "formik"; import { useParams, useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { BookedFlightAPI, retrieveAFlightById } from "../api/CallingApi"; import "./BookedFlight.css"; // Import the CSS file export default function BookedFlight() { const navigate = useNavigate(); const { id } = useParams(); const [initialValues, setInitialValues] = useState({ flightId: id !== "-1" ? id : "", departureFrom: "", arrivalTo: "", departure: "", departureTime: "", returnDate: "", seatsAvailable: "", passengerName: "" }); useEffect(() => { const fetchFlightById = async () => { if (id && id !== "-1") { try { const response = await retrieveAFlightById(id); setInitialValues({ flightId: id, departureFrom: response.data.departureFrom || "", arrivalTo: response.data.arrivalTo || "", departure: response.data.departure || "", departureTime: response.data.departureTime || "", returnDate: response.data.returnDate || "", seatsAvailable: response.data.seatsAvailable || "", passengerName: response.data.passengerName || "" }); } catch (error) { console.error("Error fetching flight:", error); } } }; fetchFlightById(); }, [id]); function onSubmit(values) { const ticket = { flightId: values.flightId, departureFrom: values.departureFrom, arrivalTo: values.arrivalTo, departure: values.departure, departureTime: values.departureTime, returnDate: values.returnDate, seatsAvailable: values.seatsAvailable, passenger: values.passenger, passengerName: values.passengerName, passengerName2: values.passengerName2, passengerAdult: values.passengerAdult, passengerAdult2: values.passengerAdult2 , dateOfBirth: values.dateOfBirth , dateOfBirth2: values.dateOfBirth2 , contactNo: values.contactNo }; BookedFlightAPI(ticket) .then(response => { navigate("/successpage"); }) .catch(error => { console.error("Booking failed:", error); alert("Booking failed. Please try again."); }); } function validate(values) { let errors = {}; if (!values.passengerName) { errors.passengerName = "Passenger name is required"; } if (!values.flightId && id !== "-1") { errors.flightId = "Flight ID is required"; } return errors; } return (

{id === "-1" ? "Create New Booking" : "Confirm Your Flight"}

{(props) => (

Flight Information

)}
); }
